content: as i was planning for a long trip to europe i wanted to bring a project that was small enough to keep in my purse and simple enough to work on during train rides or trips to the pub inspired by dyers who ll crank a sock tube for you i decided to just make my own i worked on the body of a pair of socks on my trip then once i got back home i divided and finished no carrying around a contrast color or extra tools no second sock syndrome just one big tube here s a link to the pdf 1 with my notes 1 https //www dropbox com/scl/fi/sdjk5w7im0quepi5lzvl1/the-big-tube pdf rlkey=w2d04b1g6djeycpvm5b4y2utx&st=zgad50xx&dl=0
